title: List of all Android book app  libraries for use in your project
meta: See collection of all Android book app  libraries, filter by license, modified date, languages, and select best for your usecase.

repoList.name: bookipedia
repoList.description: Bookipedia is an open-source mobile library: a completely free app where you can read hundreds of books

repoList.name: Books_Library_App
repoList.description: App illustrating the Book Listing App Project, done as part of Udacity's Android Basics Nanodegree course

repoList.name: Hotel-Booking-App-like-OYO
repoList.description: Android App : All the Api are developed on PHP and some android library is used

repoList.name: SkipTheLibrary
repoList.description: Collaborative book sharing app!

repoList.name: nfc-starter-apps
repoList.description: Here are 3 starter apps to kick off your NFC development for Android. These apps were originally created for _Professional Android Sensor Development_ published by Wrox Press and forked from the book's _Great Android Sensing Toolkit_ library available on github: https://github.com/pchen/gast-lib

repoList.name: MyLibrary_Android_Application
repoList.description: This is an Android application which allows the user to manage his personal library. The goal is to be able to look for books information thanks to the Google Book API and then be able to add this book to our personal library on this app. Then the user can update an added books to put his personal rate, and his own point a view about it for example. I'm using Google Sign in API to connect to the app, Google Book API to find information about a book entered by the user, Retrofit to deal with the JSON file sent by the API and I use a SQLite database

repoList.name: SearchbookApp
repoList.description: An android app used to search for any book (either by Author, ISBN, Book Title etc.) online using the OpenLibrary API with links to Goodreads, Library of Congress etc.

repoList.name: Book-Library
repoList.description: An Android app on pdf book download , read , commenting on books etc with MySql Database

repoList.name: eBook-Library
repoList.description: Book Store App

repoList.name: BookListingApp
repoList.description: This is Simple Book Listing App made with using Google Book's Api, And Layout Designing With Android.support Design Library Thanks to Androidhive.com

repoList.description: Bookipedia is an open-source mobile library: a completely free app where you can read hundreds of books
